
describe-time-based-auto-scaling
********************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Describes time-based auto scaling configurations for specified
instances.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-time-based-auto-scaling
     --instance-ids <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--instance-ids"  (list of string)
   An array of instance IDs.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
